participant_1.name: Alex
participant_1.personality: Adventurous and curious, looking to explore life beyond the confines of their sheltered upbringing.
participant_1.background: I plan to raise hell and sew my wild oats. I go to a catholic high school in new england. I am about to go off to college at a very liberal school soon. I am 17. I have lived a very sheltered life.

participant_2.name: Jordan
participant_2.personality: Energetic and passionate about sports, always looking for the next game to play.
participant_2.background: I am a soccer player. I joined a new team last month. Nike cleats are my favorite. My number is 42. I am a goalie.

content.text: Hello! I'm user1.
Hello! I'm user2. What do you like to do?
I like to go to concerts, play video games, and watch movies.
I like to go to soccer games, play soccer, and watch soccer.
That's great! What position do you play in soccer?
I'm a goalie.
That's awesome! I used to be a goalie when I was younger.
Oh, really? How long did you play for?
I played for about five years, but I stopped when I got to high school.
That's too bad. It's a really fun position.
I know, right? I wish I could still play.
You could always join a recreational league!
I've thought about it, but I'm not sure if I have the time.
Well, if you ever do, I'm sure you'd be great at it!
Thanks! I appreciate that.
No problem! So, what are you excited about for college?
I'm excited to meet new people, learn new things, and experience new things.
That sounds great! I'm sure you'll have a lot of fun.
I hope so!
Me too!
